# Guardian (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers:** Once per day, you can add your cleric or shaman level to a single saving throw you make.

**Guardian Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Shield of Faith (Spell)|Shield of Faith]]****:** Aura grants +2 or higher deflection bonus.

**2 Warning:** Subject gets +4 to [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] (v3.5 Listen and Spot) and retains Dex bonus to AC when [[Flat-Footed|flat-footed]].

**3** **[[Substitution (Spell)|Substitution]]****:** Half the damage you take is transferred to a figure of a spirit or deity.

**4 Snake Barrier:** Keeps reptiles at bay.

**5** **[[Dispel Chaos (Spell)|Dispel Chaos]]****/****[[Dispel Evil (Spell)|Evil]]****/****[[Dispel Good (Spell)|Good]]****/****[[Dispel Law (Spell)|Law]]****:** +4 bonus against attacks.

**6** **[[Stoneskin (Spell)|Stoneskin]]****:** Stops blows, cuts, stabs, and slashes.

**7** **[[Repulsion (Spell)|Repulsion]]****:** Creatures canâ€™t approach you.

**8 Surelife:** Protects you from one kind of certain death.

**9** **[[Antipathy (Spell)|Antipathy]]****:** Object or location affected by spell repels certain creatures.

**Source:** Oriental Adventures (WotC), pg. 87
